slides.title: Pumps
slides.description: We offer solar, electric, engine and manual water pumps for irrigation or water transfer. We also provide solutions to water shortage challenges.

slides.title: Hoses
slides.description: We offer a comprehensive range of hoses for agriculture, construction, domestic purposes and various machine operations.

slides.title: Fittings
slides.description: We offer a wide variety of plumbing, agricultural and water transfer fittings or accessories. We do both  indoor and outdoor plumbing.

slides.title: Spares
slides.description: Our products are supported with all the necessary spare parts and our team of engineers are readily available for technical support. Contact us at a branch near you. Mbale, Gulu, Arua, Mbarara, Lyantonde, Jinja, Kampala, Hoima and more.

slides.title: Generators
slides.description: We supply and support a full range of standby and prime generators for outdoor activities and power supply.
